message_1: A quintic Fano threefold can be defined as a variety in projective 4-space with degree 5 and Picard number 1. If such a variety has 3175 lines on it, what is its degree in projective 4-space?
message_2: The degree of a quintic Fano threefold in projective 4-space is 5. The number of lines on it (in this case, 3175) does not affect its degree.
